introduction: SYNOPSISHan Kang-uk is a Taekwondo master. His girlfriend, Yeon-hwa, betrays him, and takes off to Hong Kong with the Japanese Hashimodo. Hashimodo was once Kang-uk's friend and they even rod ocean liners together. When Kang-uk hears that Hashimodo and Yeon-hwa are doing well in the mob underground in Hong Kong, he goes to see them. This is Kang-uk's first time in Hong Kong and he experiences difficult days in early days. But Kang-uk takes over Hong Kong's red district at last and makes a name for himself. His strategy is right on the mark and Hashimodo's gang challenges him on numerous occasions. However, in the end, Kang-uk defeats his worthy adversaries and faces Hashimodo in a fight.故事hanganguk的跆拳道大师听说在逃跑是积极的消息，香港黑道与日本朋友MODO，瓮津你喜欢的情人软化骑着像他们的海船的背叛，一次去了香港。不过，香港的领导人韩刚旭只是一个死胡同。最后，康佑抓住了香港的妓女，广为宣传。他的策略是接受来自桥本家的很多挑战，但是Kowuk终于击败强人并且与桥本战斗。
